SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.index

Class IndexedMessageContext

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mailbox.index.IndexedMessageContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageContext
public class IndexedMessageContext extends Object implements MessageContext
A MessageContext implementation backed by a MessageIndexEntry.

This allows SearchCriteria to evaluate against indexed data without parsing the actual message.

For TEXT and BODY searches, this context returns empty content since body text is not indexed. Searches requiring body content must fall back to ParsedMessageContext.

All string comparisons in search criteria are case-insensitive, and the index stores all values in lowercase, so matching is straightforward.

Author:
Chris Burdess
